org.dbasu.robomvvm.viewmodel

Class ItemCheckedEventArg

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dbasu.robomvvm.componentmodel.EventArg
      • org.dbasu.robomvvm.viewmodel.ItemCheckedEventArg

  • public class ItemCheckedEventArg
extends EventArg
    Raised by ViewModelCollection to notify about the checked status of its items.
